name: Oversized Sleep Set
description: Chic style meets airy comfort in this oversized striped sleep set made with our signature Cotton Poplin. Includes a long sleeve button-up shirt with an embroidered chest pocket. The pant features a thin elastic waistband with picot trim, front buttons, and side pockets. Fits true to size.

name: Feel Special Set
description: All set for spring. This relaxed-fit cami and short duo is made from our cherry blossom tulle and adorned with rosette and bow detailing for flirty flair. Features thin, adjustable straps, dainty picot trim, and a 100% cotton gusset. Fits true to size.

name: Short Sleep Set
description: Meet the ultra-soft sleep set of your dreams. This classic button-up sleepwear top and fitted shorts have a classic look and ultra-comfortable feel. Features chest pocket details and interior drawstrings. Fits true to size.
